name: Cavern Crawl
description:
In Cavern Crawl, you play a character that is in a dungeon that is seemingly collapsing behind them. You have a candle with a limited area range, and the rest of the cave is dark. Can you make it out with the least deaths?

The three of us had come up with many different options for the look of our game and eventually stuck on the classic dungeon running game. This is our first time finishing a game jam together and despite taking breaks, some of us waking up later than usual, or just life bouncing us from place to place it’s still a game that we had fun making and we have learned a lot just by participating.

Programs Used:

Game Engine: Unity 2018.2.3f1

Model Creator: Maya 2018

Model Painter: Substance Painter

Texture Creation: Adobe Photoshop CC

Created by Rawful

Programmers: @iwannadraw (itch.io) and Thi Tran

Level Design: @iwannadraw

3D Models: @SpoopsMcGeeArt (Twitter)

3D Painting: @SpoopsMcGeeArt

Use WASD to move! Have fun!
